channel.title: Post your Minecraft home
channel.description:
Well seeing as their is a lot of people going on minecraft now I thought we should post our homes on it ;) So far on this world I have played 4 Hours?
Front view: http://host-me.info/?di=1412937484973
Ground floor: http://host-me.info/?di=1012937486112 (After entering the door on the front view)
Floor 1: http://host-me.info/?di=112937486705
Floor 2: http://host-me.info/?di=912937486866 (Different view) http://host-me.info/?di=11129374869410 (Different view) http://host-me.info/?di=412937487650 (Different view)
Floor - 1: http://host-me.info/?di=312937487676
Floor - 2?: http://host-me.info/?di=212937488927 (Entrance - Going to use this to create tunnels looking for ore) http://host-me.info/?di=1512937489383 (Forward a bit) http://host-me.info/?di=14129374894613 (Different view)
Will replace with a video once it has all uploaded.

item.title: Post your Minecraft home
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:65, topic:375946”][quote author=Frell link=topic=471880.msg3582171#msg3582171 date=1303875505]

i tried to make a lava waterfall on my empire and burned the inside out and covered it in lava that remained even when the source block was removed…

I was wondering what that was… haha.

You guys live wayy to far away from everything. I moved in with David.
[/quote]And we are going to have an epic empire! I’m working on leveling the area around the main house out, so I can have a nice fenced in area with torches so no mobs will spawn etc

ps I found an epic mine, 18 iron + 30 coal in like on minute You’ll see the entrance I made in the house, trust me.[/quote]
You should, like, make floating pathways to other places and make them work with minecarts or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your Minecraft home
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2

@davidi2 wrote:

i tried to make a lava waterfall on my empire and burned the inside out and covered it in lava that remained even when the source block was removed…

I was wondering what that was… haha.
[/quote]
You guys live wayy to far away from everything. I moved in with David.[/quote]And we are going to have an epic empire! I’m working on leveling the area around the main house out, so I can have a nice fenced in area with torches so no mobs will spawn etc

ps I found an epic mine, 18 iron + 30 coal in like on minute You’ll see the entrance I made in the house, trust me.

item.title: Post your Minecraft home
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:60, topic:375946”]i tried to make a lava waterfall on my empire and burned the inside out and covered it in lava that remained even when the source block was removed…

:([/quote]
Lava just takes too much time to get removed. You can speed things up with a water bucket but that will give you more cobblestone to mine (which I think is better than having to wait for lava to fall down)

Read full topic

item.title: Post your Minecraft home
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:55, topic:375946”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=471880.msg3580397#msg3580397 date=1303756484]

[img ]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/408/20110424214734.png[/ img]
This is my home so far, it will have water walls once i finish the frame and mine shit tons of iron its going to expand outwards.
thats Singularities railway, i’ll be building a tunnle over it and make a little stop for it once i finish with the main building.

hehe skele
[/quote]thanx for building it in my view, the tinly house in the trees is mine if you have noticed it

and why the fugly line of cobble

Sorry dude, it’ll much better when its done, and which line of cobble? the one on the floor or in the air?[/quote]floor

and it’s okay, i can understand if you want to make something big.

Read full topic
